pullrequest.title: Fix compiler warnings over deprecated gazebo functions

content.raw:
I ran a bash script for this from the root of drcsim source directory:
~~~
for i in $(grep -rnI ConnectWorldUpdate . | sed -e 's@:.*@@'); \
do \
  sed -e 's@WorldUpdateStart@WorldUpdateBegin@' $i > $i.tmp; \
  mv $i.tmp $i; \
done
~~~
content.html:
I ran a bash script for this from the root of drcsim source directory:

for i in $(grep -rnI ConnectWorldUpdate . | sed -e 's@:.*@@'); \
do \
  sed -e 's@WorldUpdateStart@WorldUpdateBegin@' $i > $i.tmp; \
  mv $i.tmp $i; \
done
